name: @visa/nova-icons-react
description: Visa Product Design System's Nova icons React package.
author: Visa Product Design System

scripts.build:sprite: npx @svgr/cli --typescript --no-svgo --ref --svg-props focusable='false' --svg-props aria-hidden='true' --out-dir dist/sprite --index-template sprite-index-template.js --template sprite-template.js --filename-case kebab -- ../sprite
scripts.build:svg: npx @svgr/cli --typescript --no-svgo --ref --title-prop --desc-prop --svg-props focusable='false' --svg-props aria-hidden='true' --out-dir dist/ --index-template index-template.js --template template.js --filename-case kebab -- ../svg/
scripts.clean:transpiled: pnpm clean:cjs && pnpm clean:esm && pnpm clean:js && pnpm clean:types
scripts.build:copy: cp package.json dist/ && cp index.ts dist/ && cp message-icon.tsx dist/ && cp ../../README.md dist/ && cp .npmignore dist/
